prf::HistidineTip

prf::HistidineTip Class Reference
[Geometrical objects]

Pentagon at the tip of the side chain of Histidine. More...

#include <HistidineTip.hh>

Inherits prf::Node.

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Exclusively meant to be used in Histidine. Places the Pentagon in space.

Member Function Documentation

void HistidineTip::Create (  )  [virtual]

Using the position of Base, Root and Junction, and the state of the degree of freedom associated with the node, find the coordinates of all other atoms in the node.

Reimplemented from prf::Node.
